payload.subject: orchestrator-system-fixes-complete
payload.description:
SYSTEM FIXES DEPLOYED - RESTART RECOMMENDED

CRITICAL FIXES COMPLETED:
✓ cli-identity.sh: BASH_SOURCE compatibility fixed (lines 12, 150)
✓ cli-identity.sh: Python boolean conversion fixed  
✓ Coordination messages: All blocking issues cleared
✓ Planning rules: Enhanced in parallel-coordination.md

IMPROVEMENTS FOR YOU:
1. Identity activation now works through Claude Bash tool
2. No more 'BASH_SOURCE[0]: parameter not set' errors
3. Coordination system cleared and operational
4. Planning artifact requirements clarified

ACTION RECOMMENDED:
1. RESTART your CLI session to pick up fixes
2. Run: source scripts/cli-identity.sh backend
3. Verify: echo $CLAUDE_INSTANCE_ID (should show 'backend')
4. Check messages: ./scripts/coordination/check-messages.sh
5. Run session start: ./scripts/check-compliance.sh --session-start

IF YOU HAVE UNCOMMITTED WORK:
- Check: git status
- If P03-F02 work is complete: commit it
- If P03-F02 work in-progress: git stash save 'P03-F02 wip'
- Then refresh identity and continue

PLANNING REMINDER:
New section added to parallel-coordination.md:
- You create and own .workitems/P01-*, P02-*, P03-*, P06-*
- ALWAYS create planning artifacts FIRST
- Inline user plans do NOT replace formal .workitems/ folders
- See 'Planning Artifact Requirements' section for details

SESSION START CHECKLIST:
□ source scripts/cli-identity.sh backend
□ Verify CLAUDE_INSTANCE_ID is set
□ Check branch matches agent/* prefix
□ Acknowledge any pending messages
□ Run: ./scripts/check-compliance.sh --session-start

All systems operational. Continue with your assigned work.
